summary:
- The selected income statement data for the bank is given below:
- Net interest income $ 516,446 ($504,757 after tax), provision for credit losses $ 14,805 ($12,609 in loans), noninterest income $ 78,176 ($85,063 after tax), noninterest expense $ 321,864 ($306,134 after tax), income tax expense $ 53,528 ($51,173 after tax), net income available to common shareholders $ 192,736 ($201,209 after tax), and dividends $ 1.00 ($1.32 after tax) per share.
- The total liabilities and equity are $18,558,168 ($16,357,736 after tax) and the total interest-earning assets are $66,133 ($66,517 after tax).
- The interest rate spread is 3.47% ($3.26%), the average interest-earning assets to interest-bearing liabilities are 141.15% ($149.04%), and the net interest income is $11,689 ($15,252 after tax).
